item.title: Building an Application in Docker while Offline | no dogma blog
item.description: I didn't realize until recently that I wouldn't be able to build a container image of my application while offline. Because only my code was changing, I didn't think Docker would need to make internet requests, but it does. With some digging I figured out how to work offline.
